Ukraine's top general criticises draft offices in rare press conferenceUkrainian army chief General Valeriy Zaluzhnyi said on Tuesday that he was not satisfied with the work of military draft offices that are responsible for mobilising troops to keep up the war effort against Russia. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 14:37:29 GMT DSMZX3AKVBPUVEVTLJPKN5JTJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-top-general-criticises-draft-offices-rare-press-conference-2023-12-26/Max Hunder世界欧洲
Canada ready to pay settlements to two men imprisoned in China in 2018 - reportCanada's government is willing to sign off on multimillion-dollar settlement packages for Canadians Michael Spavor and Michael Kovrig to compensate them for the near three years they were incarcerated in Chinese prisons, the Globe and Mail reported on Tuesday, citing government sources. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 14:33:53 GMT QSOZAIEKSZILJHAUS5CBERX54U https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-ready-pay-settlements-two-men-imprisoned-china-2018-report-2023-12-26/Reuters世界美洲
Blast near Israeli embassy in New Delhi, all staff unharmedA blast occurred near the Israeli embassy in New Delhi on Tuesday evening and all staff were unharmed following the explosion, authorities said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 14:03:16 GMT VGWNISHXQFO33C6MDZ3MKFVHTA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/new-delhi-police-investigate-reported-blast-near-israel-embassy-ndtv-citing-pti-2023-12-26/Reuters世界印度
Anti-war candidate barred from running against Putin lodges appealA former TV journalist who opposes Russia's war in Ukraine and who was disqualified on Saturday as a candidate for Russia's upcoming presidential election has lodged an appeal with the Supreme Court. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:40:32 GMT PI4CJBUJF5NNJLLH2CVDC3SPII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/anti-war-candidate-barred-running-against-putin-lodges-appeal-2023-12-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Congo government bans opposition election protestDemocratic Republic of Congo's government on Tuesday banned an opposition protest planned for Wednesday over last week's chaotic national election as early results showed President Felix Tshisekedi in the lead. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:40:05 GMT JYZM7RBYK5LNRKJ5PGWNBY34QQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-government-bans-opposition-election-protest-2023-12-26/Reuters世界非洲
Iran's Raisi to visit Turkey on Jan. 4 for talks focused on Gaza -Turkish officialIranian President Ebrahim Raisi will visit Ankara on Jan. 4 to meet his Turkish counterpart Tayyip Erdogan for talks likely to focus on the situations in Gaza and Syria as well as bilateral ties, a Turkish official said on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:15:51 GMT L7MGB2HS3ZJBVCUGAV54SCUXLE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/irans-raisi-visit-turkey-jan-4-talks-focused-gaza-turkish-official-2023-12-26/Reuters世界中东
Xi vows to prevent anyone 'splitting Taiwan from China'President Xi Jinping vowed on Tuesday to resolutely prevent anyone from "splitting Taiwan from China in any way", the official Xinhua news agency reported, a little more than two weeks before Taiwan elects a new leader. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 13:02:41 GMT CGX7UKC55FPDXOY7WCXTZCX32E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/xi-vows-prevent-anyone-splitting-taiwan-china-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Iran undoes slowdown in enrichment of uranium to near weapons-grade -IAEAIran has reversed a months-long slowdown in the rate at which it is enriching uranium to up to 60% purity, close to weapons grade, the U.N. nuclear watchdog said on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:45:18 GMT HTCZLKR2CJLMLA33LF4YTY3PZY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-undoes-slowdown-enrichment-uranium-near-weapons-grade-iaea-2023-12-26/Francois Murphy世界中东
Israeli minister hints at retaliatory actions taken in Iraq, Yemen, IranIsraeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant hinted on Tuesday that the country had retaliated in Iraq, Yemen and Iran for attacks carried out against it as the war with Hamas-led Palestinian militants in the Gaza Strip widens to other areas of the region. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:38:49 GMT XULQHTH7OJKR3N3KY2YVQHFDGY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-minister-hints-retaliatory-actions-taken-iraq-yemen-iran-2023-12-26/Reuters世界中东
As election looms, Biden struggles to match Trump's judicial appointmentsThe White House is gearing up for what could be President Joe Biden's last chance to put his stamp on the judiciary, as progressive advocates fret that he may fall short of appointing as many judges as former President Donald Trump did over his four-year term. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 11:06:19 GMT 6WL2AVZ57BOSPFQVCKCIA7RI7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/election-looms-biden-struggles-match-trumps-judicial-appointments-2023-12-26/Nate Raymond世界美国
Explosions reported in Red Sea shipping lane off Yemen coastExplosions in the Red Sea off the coast of Yemen were reported on Tuesday after sightings of unmanned aircraft and missiles in two separate incidents, a British maritime authority said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:55:37 GMT SOQDRZ5DU5OI5DV7WELZYI355Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/vessel-near-yemen-said-report-drones-explosions-red-sea-2023-12-26/Reuters世界中东
